DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_FUNIL_STATUS_VALOR_GESTOR_PRODUTO
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 CASE TEMPERATURA
 WHEN 1 THEN 'NONE'
 WHEN 2 THEN 'UPSIDE'
 WHEN 3 THEN 'HOT'
 WHEN 4 THEN 'COMMIT'
 END TEMPERATURA,
 SUM(VALORTOTAL+RECORRENTE+VALORSAAS) VALORTEMP,
 CASE TEMPERATURA
 WHEN 1 THEN '#5C9BD1'
 WHEN 2 THEN '#F4D03F'
 WHEN 4 THEN '#D91E18'
 WHEN 5 THEN '#26C281'
 END AS COR
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE TEMPERATURA IS NOT NULL
AND FILIAL = @FILIAL
GROUP BY TEMPERATURA
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="TEMPERATURA" From="A" Path="TEMPERATURA" /> <DecimalField Alias="VALORTEMP" From="A" Path="VALORTEMP" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
